rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice five permanents. If you do, this spell costs {3} less to cast.
When you cast this spell, discard your hand, then search your library and/or graveyard for seven cards and put them into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.
Indestructible
